ITEM.label: buttmag

ITEM.label: find_freq
ITEM.SP: : parameter compatibility for elliptic filter design

ITEM.label: frmag
ITEM.SP: : magnitude of the frequency responses of FIR and IIR filters.

ITEM.label: fsfirlin
ITEM.SP: : design of FIR, linear phase (frequency sampling technique)

ITEM.label: fwiir
ITEM.SP: : optimum design of IIR filters in cascade realization,

ITEM.label: iir
ITEM.SP: : designs an iir digital filter using analog filter designs.

ITEM.label: group
ITEM.SP: : calculate the group delay of a digital filter

ITEM.label: optfir
ITEM.SP: : optimal design of linear phase filters using linear programming

ITEM.label: remezb
ITEM.SP: : minimax approximation of a frequency domain magnitude response.

ITEM.label: srfaur
ITEM.SP: : square-root algorithm for the algebraic Riccati equation.

ITEM.label: system
ITEM.SP: : generates the next observation given the old state

ITEM.label: trans
ITEM.SP: : transformation of standardized low-pass filter into low-pass, high-pass, band-pass, stop-band.

ITEM.label: wfir
ITEM.SP: : linear-phase windowed FIR low-pass, band-pass, high-pass, stop-band

ITEM.label: wigner
ITEM.SP: : time-frequency wigner spectrum of a signal.

ITEM.label: zpch1
ITEM.SP: : poles of a type 1 Chebyshev analog filter

ITEM.label: zpch2
ITEM.SP: : poles and zeros of a type 2 Chebyshev analog filter

ITEM.label: zpell
ITEM.SP: : poles and zeros of prototype lowpass elliptic filter

ITEM.SP: : spectral estimation using the modified periodogram method.

ITEM.label: intdec
ITEM.SP: : change the sampling rate of a 1D or 2D signal

ITEM.label: mese
ITEM.SP: : calculate the maximum entropy spectral estimate

ITEM.label: hilb
ITEM.SP: : Hilbert transform centred around the origin.

ITEM.label: hank
ITEM.SP: : hankel matrix of the covariance sequence of a vector process

ITEM.label: phc
ITEM.SP: : State space realisation by the principal hankel component approximation method,

ITEM.SP: : identification by the recursive prediction error method
